name: Chainspot
shortDescription: Chainspot aggregates cross-chain solutions such as Router, Gas Charger and Analytics (114+ bridges)
description:
Chainspot is an aggregator of the best cross-chain solutions for users and developers
Explore data on 100+ Bridges, get the best swap rates in our Router (20+ chains, 12+ bridges and 2 partner routers with $7B+ liquidity integrated), top up your wallets in 11+ chains with Gas Charger. Find the best analytical data (reports, expert articles, detailed on-chain statistics, etc.), rankings and lists with live on-chain metrics.
